author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
You can learn more about neural networks and deep learning on Brilliant. First 30 days are free and you will get 20% off the annual premium subscription when you use our link ➜  https://brilliant.org/sabine. 

As AI continues to develop (slowly), users are discovering that AI chatbots are becoming nicer, indeed too nice, sometimes encouraging bad ideas and refusing to criticize obvious bullshit. Why is that and what does it mean for the future of AI? Let’s find out.

The recent paper about AI sycophancy is here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.08177
